title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Pilatus PC 6 - Start the engine
description:
In this how to we are going to look how to start the engine of the Pilatus PC 6 which has been added to MSFS 2020 as part of Sim Update VII. After we did the initial review of the cockpit we will start the engines and once everything is OK we will taxi to the runway and take off.
